channel.title: 0.9.3 Patch Notes
channel.description:
## General: * Acolyte has been removed. RIP * Two new classes. The Hunter and it's converted Unseen class, the Poacher. * Luxx drew the night abilities for the two classes. https://luxx-tux.tumblr.com/ * During elections for a new King, candidates will no longer be able to vote. * There are now more indicators to tell you who you are.
## Cult Leader: * Added the Acolyte's Eradicate. Has 2 uses. * Blood of Mithras has been converted to a day ability. You now choose a cult member that will be sacrificed at the end of the night. You will gain 2 more uses of Eradicate. Uses will be transferred between Cult Leaders.
## Hunter: * The Hunter is a unique Blue Dragon Killer class. * Bleeding players can be healed by either the Physician or Alchemist.
* Passive 1 (Retribution): If found guilty of treason, kill your accuser before your execution. * Passive 2 (Isolation): Occupy immune. * Night Ability 1 (Wolf Companion): 1 use Summon a wolf companion to attack a player. They will bleed and die in a day. * Night Ability 2 (Spike Traps): 2 uses Set spiked traps in your home to hurt intruders. If trapped, the visitor will bleed and die in a day, if untreated. You will be night immune.
## Illusionist: * Removed Link Minds. * New ability Mind Warp. Cause a player to receive incorrect feedback from their abilities tonight.
## Poacher: * Unseen Offensive Class. Converted from Hunter. * Passive 1 (Retribution): If found guilty of treason, kill your accuser before your execution. * Passive 2 (Isolation): Occupy immune. * Night Ability 1 (Bear Companion): 2 uses Summon a bear companion to stand outside a player’s room. No one will be able to visit the player, and they will be occupied. * Night Ability 2 (Snare Traps): 2 uses Place traps outside of a player’s room. Anyone trying to visit them will be occupied.
## Bug Fixes: * Class card fixes. * Message spam from Concentrated Wine. * Possible reconnection bug fixes. * Fixed the BD sometimes winning with evil factions. * Some others.

item.title: 0.9.3 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
orangeandblack5:

A TK with two-night delayed kills is so much weaker than the Knight that there really is no comparison, especially since he could easily kill yet another Town if mislynched

Hunter: Kill once delayed, can be healed if they turn out to be good. Bypasses death immunity.
Make self immune to death twice, and hurt visitors; if they turn out to be good, they can be healed.
Immune to being occupied.

Knight:
Guard someone, causing them to not die and you to die along with the attacker.
Can attack someone, but if they were good, you kill yourself instead.

I don’t know what makes you hate hunter. Knight is not much better.
I agree, hunter needs a day ability or something, or bleeding victims die in one night. Remember that knight only bypasses death immunity if he dies as well, though.

I think the one needing a rework really is poacher.

Read full topic

item.title: 0.9.3 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
When did I say any of that lol

I’m explaining my issues with this one (or two since it can be converted) role, not criticising anything else and certainly not your inability to change things (trust me, I’m too busy to play but I read the patch notes, so I can tell how much you work your ass off to make tons of changes). I’m sorry if I come off as overly negative, but it has all been around one role and I don’t feel anywhere near as strongly about any others.

No intent to insult y’all, just the Hunter/Poacher.

Also, thank you very much for the MW explanation.

Read full topic

item.title: 0.9.3 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description:
If you don’t like something, then just say why. You don’t need to go on a rant about it. We’ve been changing a lot during beta and actually listening to people. If you act like that constantly, then I’m not going to listen to you. You act like we’re unwilling to change anything.

Mind Warp works like it says. If you’re a Butler and you try to occupy someone, it will say they were occupy immune. If you’re a Sheriff and you investigate an Unseen member it will say they are not suspicious.

Read full topic

item.title: 0.9.3 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
That’s terrible and awful and the role is basically a slightly changed Sellsword underneath that

Like both roles are meh at best

A TK with two-night delayed kills is so much weaker than the Knight that there really is no comparison, especially since he could easily kill yet another Town if mislynched

Hunter is a liability, Poacher is underwhelming, and I hope that both can be reworked sooner or later

Maybe one of these days I’ll finish being so freaking busy so I can get on top of making suggestions to improve stuff like this so it doesn’t seem like I’m just ragging on the devs ;(

Read full topic
